forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then mainly cloudy late with light rain possible. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 66F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
